document_data.name: ''Bead of Refreshment''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Beads of refreshment''''' were [[magic item|magical]] pellets that converted a variety of liquids into fresh [[water]].
document_data.Description: The bead was spongy and gelatinous in texture and did not have any flavor.
document_data.Powers: When mixed into any non-magical, non-harmful liquid, a ''bead of refreshment'' dissolved and converted up to 1 pint (470 milliliters) of the liquid into cold drinkable water.
